regras.explicacao: INSS is progressive: each salary band is taxed separately up to the cap (R$ 8,157.41, max R$ 908.85).
Federal Income Tax (IRRF) is progressive from 7.5% to 27.5%, applied after INSS deductions.
FGTS is 8% of the gross salary, paid by the employer as a credit â€” not deducted from net pay.
